amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in House Report 115-785 to prohibit the use of funds in this bill to procure any good or service or enter into any contract with the Chinese companies ZTE and Huawei.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Gallego.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
